title: Episode 05 - Walk, Talk and Learn French
description: In this episode Pierre-Benoît and Mark look at a number of uses of the word 'bien', adjective agreements, dropping the 'ne' in 'ne ... pas' and take another look at 'en'.
content:encoded: In this episode Pierre-Benoît and Mark look at a number of uses of the word 'bien', adjective agreements, dropping the 'ne' in 'ne ... pas' and take another look at 'en'.
itunes:subtitle: In this week's show: adjective agreements, ne ... pas, and a closer look at the word 'bien'.
